all_functions module¶

class all_functions.Numbers(num_list=None)¶
find_min_max()¶

Function takes list of integers and returns min and max in a tuple

Parameters:

num_list – list of integers
Returns max_min:
 

a tuple containing the max and min of a list
Raises:
  • TypeError – checks for incorrect data types in list
  • ValueError – checks for improper values that cause errors
  • ImportError – checks for correct importation
maxdiff()¶

Function takes a list of integers and returns the maximum difference between two adjacent numbers

Parameters:

num_list – list of integers
Returns maxdiff:
 

maximum difference
Raises:
  • TypeError – checks for incorrect data types in list
  • ValueError – checks for imporper/unexpected values in list
  • ImportError – checks for correct importation
sum_list()¶

Function takes list of integers and returns the sum of the list

Parameters:

num_list – list of integers
Returns sumsum_:
 

the sum of the list of integers
Raises:
  • TypeError – checks for incorrect data types in list
  • ValueError – checks for improper values that cause errors
  • ImportError – checks for correct importation
